alert.note: Alert for La Porte; Marshall; St. Joseph; Starke (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 31 at 10:00PM EDT until March 31 at 10:45PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: The National Weather Service in Northern Indiana has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western St. Joseph County in north central Indiana... Starke County in northwestern Indiana... Northwestern Marshall County in north central Indiana... La Porte County in northwestern Indiana... Southern Berrien County in southwestern Michigan... * Until 1045 PM EDT/945 PM CDT/. * At 959 PM EDT/859 PM CDT/, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 21 miles east of Navy Pier to near Merrillville to Lowell, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... South Bend, Michigan City, La Porte, Westville, Buchanan, Knox, Trail Creek, Bridgman, Walkerton, North Liberty, New Buffalo, New Carlisle, Berrien Springs, Three Oaks, Kingsford Heights, Long Beach, Stevensville, Wanatah, Hamlet and La Crosse. This includes the following highways... Interstate 80 in Indiana between mile markers 38 and 73. Interstate 94 in Indiana between mile markers 33 and 45. Interstate 94 in Michigan between mile markers 0 and 23. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 300 AM EDT/200 AM CDT/ for north central and northwestern Indiana...and southwestern Michigan. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: La Porte; Marshall; St. Joseph; Starke
